With a black silicon strap this watch is the perfect thing to lend some attitude and composure to your casual attire.

Care Tips Clean your watch at least twice a week with a soft dry cloth. Avoid direct contact with solvents detergents perfumes cosmetics alcohols etc. Remove your watch before you lift heavy objects or do any heavy physical work.
